task_description: Facing the building to your North-West (approx. 331°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: The building is directly ahead, but I need to look up to assess its full height.
The upward view likely reveals the top of the building, but I need to adjust the pitch to see the entire structure from top to bottom.
The downward pitch should now allow me to see the base of the building, enabling a full height estimation.
